result.execSummary:
All charges against Marvin C Green Jr in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Marvin C Green Jr is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marvin C Green Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Received and Filed, Justice Point Report.
Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case dismissed without prejudice.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for jury trial.  State is not ready to proceed and requests an adjournment.  Defense objects to an adjournment.  Court takes defense motion to dismiss into consideration. Court orders case adjourned for status conference.   Court waives defendant's appearance for the status conference only.  Status conference scheduled for July 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Catelin Ringersma appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case heard off the record. Final Pretrial held. Parties ready to proceed to trial, neither party requests to address the court on the record. Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form. Case adjourned to branch 45 for Jury Trial at 8:30 am on 07-29-2015.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Catelin Ringersma appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case heard off the record. Case remains scheduled for Final Pretrial & Jury Trial. Neither party requests to address the court on the record. Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form.  Final pretrial scheduled for 7-21-2015 at 1:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for 7-29-2015 at 8:30 am in Branch 45.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

15RM031260  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
06/26/2015

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Defendant Marvin C Green in custody.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case in court with 14CM3006 for a motion hearing. Case adjourned for status conference in Branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
State's Motion to Join Cases for Trial, filed.
Bail motion by the state argued and denied by the Court.  Bail and all conditions of bail to remain the same.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Defendant Marvin C Green in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Matter before court with 14CM3006 and 15CM1027.  Defense requests a final pretrial and jury trial date for this case.  Court ordered case adjourned to Branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 21, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for July 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Correspondence from ADA Longo regarding sentencing hearing.
NO REPLY FROM SURETY/DEFENDANT.

Defense counsels motion to modify bail is DENIED by the Court. Defense requests that final pretrial and jury trial be vacated, and plea/sentencing date be set.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 46. jks  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 05-08-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Defendant Marvin C Green in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
 Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court.  Attorney Leah Thomas has been appointed as to defendant's new case and is to be appointed today on this matter also. jks

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Shawn B or the address listed on the criminal complaint.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  Defendant Marvin C Green in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for April 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Marvin C Green Jr
Current: 3007 North 24th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 03-30-2015)
Prior: 3050 North 24th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206
JUSTICEPOINT DISCHARGE SUMMARY, filed. jks
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($1,000.00 signature bond) ad
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 1000.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT. jks

Defendant Marvin C Green not in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pretrial Services Violation Report Received.  Defendant has another GPS Violation, and possible tampering violation.  Defendant has failed to respond to JusticePoint as to these matters, and failed to appear for appointment with Justicepoint.  Court spoke to attorney of record Joel Rosenthal via telephone.  He had no objection to state's motion for bench warrant to be issued.    Defendant failing to comply with conditions of JusticePoint monitoring, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court further ordered that all further dates be vacated from the calendar. jks
WCS VIOLATION REPORT SUBMITTED AND FILED - GPS Violation Inclusion Zone.  Judge did not want Mr. Green to be brought down regarding inclusion zone violation. jks

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Pretrial Services Violation Report Received.  Defendant tested positive for THC.  Defense argues that this may still be a baseline test.   State make motion to raise bail stating that baseline positive test was 1-30-2015 and it has been over a month.  Response to Violation Report - Judge will not modify bail because there is no testing system in place to prove that this is not a baseline test.  Court reminds defendant  that future test will tell and warns him to stay clean. jks

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Pretrial Services Violation Report Received.  Defendant has a Violation for tampering with his SCRAM Bracelet and leaving the Inclusion Zone of the SCRAM Bracelet. Response to Violation Report - Court admonishes defendant for tampering with SCRAM Bracelet.  Court reminds defendant that all of his violations will be noted if he goes to sentenceing in this matter.  Defense requests that defendant be allowed more time to pursue his GED.  Court will consider this upon receiving a written order.   Case remains scheduled for 5-8-2015 for final pretrial in Branch 46. jks

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requests a jury trial date.  Counsel is unavailble for all April days offered.   Court ordered case adjourned for final pre-trial conference and jury trial in Branch 46. jks

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defense motion to modify conditions of bail regarding SCRAM Bracelet is GRANTED by the Court.  Court will allow defendant to be taken by his sister to get an ID, and to have SCRAM bracelet removed for medical appointments, only when with his sister/legal caretaker Prinekque B.  SCRAM bracelet is to be replaced immediately after each appointment.  Order from Defense Counsel to this effect is to be provided to the Court to be signed by the judge.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 46.  This is to be the FINAL status conference in this case.  jks
  Status conference scheduled for 02-25-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case heard off the record. Neither party requests to address the court on the record. Due to court congestion and the lateness of the hour, court ordered case adjourned.  Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form. All conditions of bail remain in effect. Case adjourned to branch 46.
  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for February 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Because defendant is on crutches and has had a very hard time getting around, he and defense counsel have not had a chance to have a meeting as to how to proceed with these cases.  Defense requests a 2 week adjournment to allow them to have this meeting.  Court will allow this 2 week adjournment.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 46.  Defense motion to change bond to allow defendant to go to medical and legal appointments with his sister/legal caretaker Prinekque Barnett instead of his mother is GRANTED by the Court.  All other conditions of bail are to remain the same. jks

  Status conference scheduled for 02-16-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court.  Michael Christopher Schindhelm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
  ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE.  BRANCH 40 FOR BRANCH 46.
Court here on GPS violation.  Court admonished defendant regarding his many, immediate violation and advised him that any further violations will result in higher cash bail.  Court also admonished the defendant regarding his positive THC test.  Case adjourned to Br. 46 on 2/02/15 at 8:30 am.

Attorney Joel H. Rosenthal in court, defendant Marvin C Green not in court, in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered signature bond set with a Turnover to Justicepoint for GPS monitoring.  Conditions of bail:  Defendant is not to leave his home except for medical and legal appointments.  He may only leave for these appointments if he is with his mother.  Court also ordered No Weapons in the home, subject to search by the Police.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 46. jks
  Status conference scheduled for 02-02-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marvin C Green not in court, defendant in custody, Not produced.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Rosenthal has yet to be appointed on this case.  He will contact the public defender's office to confirm his appointment today.    Court ordered case adjourned for status conference and bail bond hearing in Branch 46. jks

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision monitored by drug testing.
    No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with SHAWN B. OR the address listed on the criminal complaint
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Marvin C Green in court with attorney Brian C. Hagner.  Defendant Marvin C Green in custody.  William Nathaniel Gale Barron appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.   On DEFENSE motion, Court ordered COUNT 2 DISMISSED; LACKING PROBABLE CAUSE.  AS TO COUNT 1:   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for January 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
